properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thaane yonarche mahaa kaaryamulan paapini Rakshimpa bali yaayen shatruni raajyamu Koola drosenu smariyinchudi meerandarunu Aayannanu stutiyinchudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jnaapaka munchuko ishraayelu vidipinche Naiguptinundi naluvadi vatsaramulu Nadipinche kaanaanuku mimmunu cherchutaku Aayananu stutiyinchudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mosheku thana sevanu nosage yehoshuvaa Jayamunu ponde shatruni gelchi raajyamu Ponde ghana kaaryamulanu smariyinchi Aayananu stutiyinchudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Meere prabhuni swantha prajalugaa kone Mimmu thana rakhtamutho aatmala cherchi Sanghamu katte aa reetini kani smariyinchu Aayananu stutiyinchudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pilichenu prabhuvu sevaku mimmu nede Vinu maayana swaramu arpinchudi mee Jeevithamulanu saagilapadi aayana yeduta Aayananu stutiyinchudi{/lang-eng}
